website_summaries.verdict: This rear-mount carrier has a higher weigh limit than most other seats.
pros: Designed for children ages 9 months to 6 years, and up to 48.5 pounds
Can be mounted and dismounted from bike quickly using universal quick-release bracket
Fits most bike frames, check sizing
Integrated protection wings safeguard hands when bike leans against a wall
cons: This seat is heavy, because it is built to accommodate larger children
It may affect your center of gravity
May be too big for smaller, lighter bikes

customer_reviews.title: Huge design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The seat itself is fine, and admittedly my child loves it, the problem is the quick release mount... there’s no where to mount it so that at the bottom of the pedal stroke it’s not hitting the back of my legs. If the rear triangle of my frame joined the seat tube higher up I’d probably be ok (as I could mount it closer to the seat), but on my bike (and presumably a large number of common road frame geometries) it’s not possible. It makes the seat completely unusable and since I’ve already removed it from the packaging I can’t do a return :-( massively disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat, but didn't fit my bike
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit my Firmstrong Chief Lady cruiser. I had to use the low saddle seat adapter, but just not enough clearance over the wheel. When my 27lb daughter sat in it, it touched the wheel. Really liked the seat otherwise and wish we could have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: coletann

customer_reviews.title: Broke during Installation
customer_reviews.text: I stripped one of the screws while I was tightening down the bracket which attaches to the bike The bracket was still loose just before the screw stripped so I do not think this was my fault. I called Thule customer service and they wouldn't do anything for me. I expect better quality for the price I paid. Needless to say my daughter was very disappointed that we couldn't go for a ride.
customer_reviews.author: soniak

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit all bikes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it seems like a good product. I was able to fix the bracket to my wife's bike and could bike my son around; he enjoyed it a lot and it seems very sturdy. However, I have a bad back and therefore I want this to fit on my bike which is much more comfortable for me to ride so that I can ride with my son. So I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Chad J Downey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit small frame mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed solid so I gave it 4 stars. Unfortunately it didn’t fit my small framed bike. I have a pitch sport from specialized Xsmall frame with 27.5” tires. The seat literally just sat on top of the tire. I would keep it if it had a longer bar that would let it fit my bike!!
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best Investments I have done! After month and month of research we decided to buy thing one based on reviews and other people's experiences and safety. It is so easy to install and move from one bike to another (by getting another box). My baby loves it. I can barely feel her even when she wiggles or moves around. We have been using it non stop. My daughter is now 2, 28 pounds and she LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good product, missing key for the lock
customer_reviews.text: Product was in good condition overall. My kid really liked it and I felt safe with her on it. assembled quickly and easily. Sturdy. Unfortunately the key is missing and I cannot lock the seat in place
customer_reviews.author: Pheelix

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby, not for bike rider
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. A 20 lb 1 year old fit perfectly. The bike rider's legs fit, no need to widen thighs while peddling. But the 5'3" bike rider's chin and chest were uncomfortably right behind the baby seat, rubbing against it when biking. May not be a problem for a tall or flat chested person.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Needs a townie hybrid bike with a tall head tube ...
customer_reviews.text: Needs a townie hybrid bike with a tall head tube or stem, and handlebars that swoop back around the chair. My mtb has a high bottom bracket to avoid rocks. But that pushes my knees up into the seat. I end up splaying my knees out while riding. Also hard to reach the handlebars without pushing my chest through the back of the chair. Handlebars that swoop back would make rhis much easier.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Its a great seat. My son is almost 4 and 37lbs, he fits comfortably. Its sturdy. I had to order a bike rack to install under this...the locking part that the seat attaches to gradually slides down as you ride and eventually touches the tire. It might not for smaller kids. Overall I love the seat, weve had many great days out on the trail since using it :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Secure and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The only improvement would be if it came with a more conventional allen wrench for installation. There is no clearance to use this tool on a small frameed bicycle. Good quality and the mounting design absorbs some of the bigger shocks from potholes etc...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This seat is awesome! It is WAY more durable than other seats I looked at and handles more weight. It also fell off my car on the highway while attached to my bike and it was barely scratched. Quality seat for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it fits your bike, because it will not fit on all bikes
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product, easy to install, and very easy to adjust for different ages or size. I have two, one in each bike for two kids
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Build Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason it’s expensive and you can tell as soon as you feel it. Thule build quality is second to none, and this works well. Daughter loves it. Fit on a Specialized Ariel low entry for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good, traditional design; does make bike a little tippy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and daughter-in-law, and their first child. They're satisfied, but it makes the bike a little tippy by raising the center of gravity. They had to buy a better, two-legged bicycle center stand, which I'd say was/is advisable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby County

customer_reviews.title: Harness needs a waist strap
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and easy to install. The one small flaw is that the harness doesn’t have a waist strap. My 18 month old is able to push his arms through the center of the harness and then can stand. I’ve adjusted the harness adjustments and tightened the straps but he can still get his arms out. He is able to get his arms out of the harness in our Thule Urban Glide Stroller but the waist strap keeps him from standing.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Frey

customer_reviews.title: Great bike seat for kiddo.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this seat. Easy to install and remove. Plastic shell is durable and protective. Foot straps and shoulder straps are comfortable and easy to get on and off one handed. Seat reclines enough that it doesn’t interfere with helmet. Bucket is deep/safe. Takes the bumps pretty good with the long steel rods that act like a spring. Great design. We’ve done 40 rides of a few miles each with no issues. Enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: I'm all about value

customer_reviews.title: Item missing
customer_reviews.text: The item is a good product. However, this was a gift and when opened and assembled, it was noted that the key to the lock was missing. I had to go directly to Thule to resolve and it was just easier to buy a new key. The shipping costs were more than the cost of a replacement key 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Grows with your child
customer_reviews.text: Excited to have a seat that our now 16 month old can use for years to come. Was easy to assemble and pop onto my husbands bike- we aren't sure if it will fit my women's small bike frame as it requires over 3" clearance but works perfectly on his! She loves the rides and breezing along with us outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryne

customer_reviews.title: Bought used
customer_reviews.text: Right foot platform came broken purchased used. Overall peoduct seems nicr but limiting to the bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Andrade

customer_reviews.title: This seat is a great product. It was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This seat is a great product. It was easy to install, the straps and foot rests are easy to adjust, and my 14 month old son seems to be very comfortable. It is also a very stylish modern design.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with small bike frames
customer_reviews.text: This seat won't work with a lot of small or extra small bike frames, there isn't enough clearance above the rear wheel based on fram geometry. Big dissapointment, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Martyn J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thule
customer_reviews.text: Well designed. Easy to install and easy to use. My kids never complain of comfort on the bike. Well built, sturdy and reliable enough to place my life in that seat.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T

customer_reviews.title: It works with size 13 my large feet!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Yepp Nexxt Maxi which worked except my heels kept hitting the plastic which was frustrating so I returned it. The Ridealong works great with no heel strike issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: nwadvm

customer_reviews.title: Delivered a used product
customer_reviews.text: When we opened up the box, the screws were loose inside. The seat had scratches and dirt. It looked used.
customer_reviews.author: donald whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, very well designed. Easy to install, my daughter loves it. I recommend instead of the kids bike trailers.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Relatively easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Relatively easy to attach, and very easy to detach once it is all assembled! Doesn't get in my way at all when I'm riding :)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Betcher

customer_reviews.title: Great riding together
customer_reviews.text: Great for my son to see and enjoy rides together. The only down side is it is very uncomfortable for them if they fall asleep
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to handle. We enjoy biking with my two yearold
customer_reviews.author: Attila Foldesi

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it! Seems comfortable. I really like how balanced it feels while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to attach to bike and remove when need be. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to connect to bike
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to connect to bike, and my son enjoys the seat very much. Have done several 4-5 mile rides. Thule makes great products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat for my granddaughter! Safe and very well constructed...
customer_reviews.author: Brent Shuttlesworth

customer_reviews.title: Thule -- Who Doesn't Love Their Products?!
customer_reviews.text: I take my daughter out on some rough terrain and she's comfy -- all that matters. All Thule products are amazing and quality stellar.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept by my seat come with a broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept by my seat came with a broken piece and looks used. The pictures were taken with the seat straight out of the box. It's a pain to have to pack it up and try to return. Just a hassle that is unnecessary as this unit was clearly used. I don't know if it is an Amazon issue or a Thule issue.
customer_reviews.author: Foxster

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The seat is great. It fit perfectly on my Electra Townie. My 8 month old loves it. The adjustable foot block are great. It's very easy to take on and off the bike as well. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat, so many good times with the boy ... make memories.
customer_reviews.author: newman shanks

customer_reviews.title: Grand Daughter approved
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves it. And I can share her with my son-in-law, who has a bracket on his bike.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came with missing parts. Unable to assemble without ALL (8) SCREWS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Thule RideAlong Child Bike Seat
product_meta.description: Get outside and stay active as a family with a Thule RideAlong child bike seat. Safe and easy to use, these front and rear-mounted kids bike seat allow you to ride as a family on daily commutes or longer biking adventures. Designed with an adjustable 3-point safety harness, a childproof buckle and a shock absorbing suspension system, your little co-pilot is will stay safe, secure and comfortable on any bike ride. Thule toddler bike seats are built with water-repellent seat lining that is easy to keep clean. Single-hand adjustable footrests and straps grow with your child, making them the bike carrier for kids from 9 months - 6 years (up to 40 lbs). Consult a pediatrician for children under 1 year old. Choose from rear-mounted Thule RideAlong and Thule RideAlong Lite, or the front-mounted Thule RideAlong Mini bicycle child seat.
feature_bullets: Safe and easy to use rear-mount child bike seat for daily commutes or family adventures
Mount or dismount in seconds with the universal quick-release bracket
Fits most frames (27.2-40 millimetre round frames and 40 x 55 millimetre oval frames)
Adjustable 3-point harness ensures child safety and the perfect fit
Smooth, comfortable ride from the shock-absorbing suspension system
One-handed reclining seat for on-the-go naps (5 options; up to 20 degree recline)
Childproof safety buckle with large button to easily secure your child
Built in reflector and safety light attachment point for added visibility
Adjustable foot rests and straps to grow with your child
Detachable padding is water repellent, machine washable and reversible

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
